basics.name: Shrungal Kulkarni
basics.title: Mechatronics Engineer
basics.summary: A passionate Mechatronics Engineer with 5+ years of experience in robotics, automation, and control systems. Specialized in developing innovative solutions for complex industrial automation challenges. Led multiple successful projects in IoT integration and smart manufacturing systems.

experience.title: Senior Mechatronics Engineer
achievements: Led a team of 5 engineers in developing an automated warehouse system, improving efficiency by 40%
Designed and implemented predictive maintenance systems using IoT sensors, reducing downtime by 60%
Developed machine learning algorithms for robot path optimization, increasing throughput by 25%

experience.title: Automation Engineer
achievements: Implemented PLC-controlled automation systems for manufacturing lines
Reduced production errors by 35% through vision system integration
Designed and deployed 12 collaborative robot applications

education.degree: Master of Science in Mechatronics Engineering

projects.name: Smart Factory Automation System
projects.description: Developed a complete factory automation system with IoT integration, real-time monitoring, and predictive maintenance capabilities

projects.name: Autonomous Mobile Robot
projects.description: Built an autonomous mobile robot for warehouse navigation using SLAM and path planning algorithms

projects.name: Predictive Maintenance Platform
projects.description: Created a machine learning-based platform for predicting equipment failures in manufacturing systems
